pr_title: chore(build): Move over relevant Github Action to try to build a kork release for 1.19.x

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure if this will work, or if Nebula will choke on this version. If that's the case, perhaps we can create a version like 7.25.12
timeline.author: jonsie
